tool_description: It's a free translator that helps you translate any text to any language
name: OpenTranslator
title: OpenTranslator

api_list.name: Open Translator
api_list.description: This is open translator by AI
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://opentranslator.p.rapidapi.com/translate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "opentranslator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://opentranslator.p.rapidapi.com/translate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "opentranslator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
